trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Surprise
There were no other sightings in Surprise on or around March 29th 2011
Summary: Bright light that faded and fighter jets looked to follow it
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my back yard in Surprise Arizona waiting for my dog to do her business before coming in and going to bed. I caught a bright light out of my peripheral vision to my right side so I turned and saw an extremely large and bright light. The object swayed from side to side and went up and down slowly. It was hovering very slowly as it did these maneuvers. The light began to fade and it moved away. As it did so fighters from Luke AFB followed it until all aircraft went out of my line of sight. I have seen demonstrations of both the F22 and F35 fly. Neither can do what this craft did. I would be very interested to see if anyone else in my area saw the same thing I did.
